channel.title: Comments on: Top 10 Strangest Gadgets of the Future
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
I changed my mind. I want a Scarpar for my birthday instead of an RC boat.
Yes, I read your blog (even that you stopped comunicating...)
item.content:encoded:
I changed my mind. I want a Scarpar for my birthday instead of an RC boat.

Yes, I read your blog (even that you stopped comunicating…)
